name: APT37, Richochet Chollima, InkySquid, ScarCruft, Reaper, Group123, TEMP.Reaper, APT 37, Ricochet Chollima, Thallium, Group 123, Red Eyes, Geumseong121, Venus 121, Hermit, ATK 4, ITG10, Operation “Erebus”, Operation “Daybreak”, Operation “Golden Time”, Operation “Evil New Year”, Operation “Are You Happy?”, Operation “FreeMilk”, Operation “North Korean Human Right”, Operation “Fractured Block”, Operation “Evil New Year 2018”, Operation “Battle Cruiser”, Operation “Star Cruiser”, Operation “Onezero”, Operation “Rocket Man”, Operation “Korean Sword”, Operation “Holiday Wiper”, Operation “Golden Bird”, Operation “High Expert”, Operation “Black Banner”, Operation “Fractured Statue”, Operation “Dragon messenger”, Operation “Spy Cloud”
description:
Heatmap of (sub)techniques for APT37, Richochet Chollima, InkySquid, ScarCruft, Reaper, Group123, TEMP.Reaper, APT 37, Ricochet Chollima, Thallium, Group 123, Red Eyes, Geumseong121, Venus 121, Hermit, ATK 4, ITG10, Operation “Erebus”, Operation “Daybreak”, Operation “Golden Time”, Operation “Evil New Year”, Operation “Are You Happy?”, Operation “FreeMilk”, Operation “North Korean Human Right”, Operation “Fractured Block”, Operation “Evil New Year 2018”, Operation “Battle Cruiser”, Operation “Star Cruiser”, Operation “Onezero”, Operation “Rocket Man”, Operation “Korean Sword”, Operation “Holiday Wiper”, Operation “Golden Bird”, Operation “High Expert”, Operation “Black Banner”, Operation “Fractured Statue”, Operation “Dragon messenger”, Operation “Spy Cloud”. Source datasets can be found here: https://github.com/tropChaud/Categorized-Adversary-TTPs

MITRE ATT&CK profile: https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0067
ETDA profile: https://apt.etda.or.th/cgi-bin/showcard.cgi?u=be6e7cee-7c2c-4298-941d-01b2106284e6
